response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,300,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for someone like yourself who appreciates its true worth. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1300000}
